title: New: Kitty Pryde – Ay Shawty (feat. Lakutis)
body:
About a week ago we posted the teaser video for **[Kitty Pryde](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18979-video-kitty-pryde-%e2%98%a0dead%e2%9d%a4island%e2%98%a0/ "Video: Kitty Pryde – ☠DEAD❤ISLAND☠")** new EP, **_D.A.I.S.Y. Rage,_** for the first time **Pryd**e’s sound seemed fully resolved. The first full track from the record sports the same level of polish. The beat is airy and smooth, with **Pryde**’s flow as self-deprecating and charmingly unsure as always.

**_D.A.I.S.Y. Rage_** drops January 31st.

The first full track from the record sports the same level of polish. The beat is airy and smooth, with Pryde’s flow as self-deprecating and charmingly unsure as always. D.A.I.S.Y. \[…\]
excerpt.short: About a week ago we posted the teaser video for Kitty Pryde new EP, D.A.I.S.Y.
